    public interface IVertex
extends IItem
    A vertex interface.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer getDistance()
      Returns the distance.
      boolean isEnd()
      Returns true if this vertex is set as the end.
      boolean isInitialized()

      Returns true if this vertex is set as the start.

        Returns true if this vertex is set as the end.

      • getDistance

        java.lang.Integer getDistance()
        Returns the distance.
        • If the vertex is initialized (infinity), Integer.MAX_VALUE will be returned.
        • If the vertex is not yet initialized (value == ""), null will be returned.
        Returns:
        the distance

      • isInitialized

        boolean isInitialized()
        Returns true if initialized.
        Returns:
        true if initialized
